attributes.action: spend more money on research into alternative fuels for private vehicle use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Clearly the price of fuel for cars is not going to drop drastically. If it does then it won’t be for long. Cars keep the UK moving, taxing car users more will eventually impact the economy. More money should be spent researching alternative fuel sources and ideally those with solutions that can be retro fitted to existing vehicles utilising an internal combustion engine.
